name: Ge.ne.sis: Down the Road of Tales
storyline: A girl named Neraine mysteriously ends up in a bizarre fantasy world and she goes a journey to seek answers where she will meet other characters as well.
summary: Ge.ne.sis is a turn-based strategy RPG made in flash for web browsers focusing on Neraine, a brooding teenage girl who mysteriously ends up in a bizarre fantasy world. Fight alongside other party members and experience the interesting tarot inspired summoning system in order to traverse this world.
